Rapidsos_GetNearbyFeedsRequest.description: Request object for getting the closest 10 feeds by latitude and longitude.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate for finding nearby feeds

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate for finding nearby feeds

width.description: Width parameter for the search area

Rapidsos_GetNearbyFeedsResponse.description: Response object containing the closest 10 feed stream URLs by latitude and longitude.

streamUrls.description: List of stream URLs for the closest 10 feeds

items.description: List of stream URLs for the closest 10 feeds
